text:
[Verse]
Woke up in a haze
Lost in the days
Dreams take me away
Colors start to blaze

[Verse 2]
Riding on a breeze
World's a mystery
Anything I please
Born to be so free

[Chorus]
Dream machine
Life so serene
What does it mean
Living in between

[Verse 3]
Stars start to align
Feelings intertwine
Time has left behind
Future's all mine

[Bridge]
See the neon glow
Where do we all go
Time's a river flow
Guess we'll never know

[Chorus]
Dream machine
Life so serene
What does it mean
Living in between
title: Dream Machine
